All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanMetadata, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class EJB3AnnotatedBeanMetadata
extends AbstractBeanMetadata

An implementation of BeanMetadata that derives its metadata properties from EJB3 annotations.
